rev.comment: I wouldn't call this guy the most notorious necrophiliac, there are more notorious that come to mind, Dahmer for example
rev.diff:
Line 75: Line 75:
As of the [[Criminal Justice and Immigration Act 2008]], it is also illegal to possess physical depictions of necrophilia, electronic or otherwise. Necrophilia-pornography falls under the governmental description of [[extreme pornography]], of which, possession is classed as illegal under the aforementioned act.
As of the [[Criminal Justice and Immigration Act 2008]], it is also illegal to possess physical depictions of necrophilia, electronic or otherwise. Necrophilia-pornography falls under the governmental description of [[extreme pornography]], of which, possession is classed as illegal under the aforementioned act.

The most notorious necrophiliac was [[John Reginald Christie]] who was hanged in 1953. He had strangled his numerous victims, and was also a [[serial killer]].
+
